comments:

BUILD FAILED

G:\eclipse 3.2\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.jst.server.websphere.core_1.0.100.v200606130315\serverdef\scripts\websphere.6.x.xml:110: Java returned: 103 


Total time: 1 minute 1 second

This sounds like an application archive problem, not server tools.  It seems the ear file is not correctly setup/assembled.   My trials with an ear containinf a Web application succeeds.

Please try it with another app server (i.e. JBoss).  It the problem is still there please provide sample projects so that we can debug ythe issue.

Please reopen the bug if the problem is reproducable.

traces.message: IWAE0006E Archive is not a valid WAR File because the deployment descriptor can not be found (case sensitive): WEB-INF/web.xml    [wsadmin]
